ygData.subject: Extreme Level
ygData.msgSnippet: I finally defeated my own level, at a cost of . . . $260,000,000 for one mage which I converted into an archmage.  The mage had 500 exp level and everything

Message-ID: <8nndg6+n3f2@...>

From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

I finally defeated my own level, at a cost of . . . $260,000,000 for 
one mage which I converted into an archmage.  The mage had 500 exp 
level and everything else was 1800.  I observed something
interesting: 
  After I converted the mage into an archmage, every Fire Elemenal 
summoned by the archmage had a negative magic power reading and a 
negative health power reading.  Interestingly enough, the mage could 
continiously do heart burst attacks and all hearth burst attacks 
covered all enemies on a given level.

Since I finally beat my own level, I will be working through all 
existing levels.  I will try to create some levels designed to work a 
team up to the point of taking own my extreme level.  Just beware, a 
team of one cleric (no matter how powerfull) will not be able to 
defeat all my levels I design.
